qas.question: How long ago was the sport of fighting chickens been around?

answers.text: Cockfighting is said to be the world's oldest spectator sport and may have originated in Persia 6,000 years ago.

qas.question: What is the termed used to define the game of fighting chickens called?

answers.text: fight each other, and will do so with great vigour until one is critically injured or killed.

qas.question: Have theere been any types of chickens who were really good at cockfighting?

answers.text: Breeds such as the Aseel were developed in the Indian subcontinent for their aggressive behaviour

qas.question: Do people bet on the cockfighting or is it just for entertainment?

answers.text: large sums were won or lost depending on the outcome of an encounter.
